Using: Snippet

{{options.snippet}}

Control Panel - ComingSoon

The BrowserSync Control Panel is a WIP & isn't quite ready for prime-time yet. While you wait though, have you considered supporting BrowserSync?

This tool will always be free & open-source, but projects like this take a huge amount of time & effort to maintain, support & improve - so contributions of any size would be very much welcomed.
